Water and wastewater utilities for newly constructed residential communities

Waters Advanced supplies clean water and wastewater services to customers in newly built residential communities, while also facilitating seamless asset adoption for developers.

about us Contact us

Who are we?

We are an independent water company, providing water and wastewater services to residential development sites across England and Wales, where they may otherwise have been serviced by an incumbent water company.

More About Us

What We Do

We provide support and expertise to enhance project outcomes and streamline development processes. These include innovative approaches to new developments, high-quality network designs engineered for longevity, efficiency, and supply security for domestic customers, and expedited technical approvals for wastewater designs to enable early adoption.

Our clients benefit from full site cost transparency across both construction and adoption phases.

More About What We Do

Section 8 Notices

Advanced Water Infrastructure Networks publishes notices under section (8)(2) of the Water Industry Act 1991 confirming we have applied for a new appointment/variation to our appointment to be the water and/or sewerage provider for these sites.

View all notices
